talk_text: #NAME#, if you're going to train someone to become the ultimate Overlord, you'll have to endure some tough challenges along the way.

You shouldn't take these trials lightly. 
They're crucial to achieving your ultimate goal.

Wait... Miss Etna.... 
You've been concocting some awful scheme?

Ding dongâ™ª! You guessed it, Flonne!
The Final Boss fight is about to begin!
Miss Etna, is this really the Final Boss battle? To be honest, I expected something a bit more impressive...

Keep watching! The show is about to begin.
Look over there.
We have finally found you, loathsome Overlord!!
When the darkness of evil is on the rise,
We crash the villainous party!
Our seven lights spring to the task,
To save the world with courage and hope!
With our powers combined we are--
The Prism...!!
Rangers!!!!
null_s

Oh, oh, oh!! This is so cool!!
It's the Prism Rangers!!
....What? Are you telling me that these guys are #NAME#'s Final Boss battle...???
Yes! They are the reason that we want to train someone to be the ultimate Overlord in the first place!

Awesome!
Come on, Prism Rangers, you can do it!

Wait a second, Flonne.
Why are you rooting for the Prism Rangers?

*Sniffles*
The Prism Rangers have lost.

Hmphâ€¦ It doesn't matter which world you're talking about! 
Justice is never inevitable!
#NAME#, if you want to train someone to be the ultimate Overlord, youâ€™re going to have to start doing whatever it takes to win.
The more despicable you are, the better! Betray, cheat! Indulge your every villainous whim!

Whenever someone doesn't do what you want, just bribe them or use violence to make them listen!
This is what a real demon would do!
Don't forget that #NAME# is actually a human....
Hahahaha......You think that defeating a couple of lame heroes like these guys counts as defeating the Final Boss? What a joke!!!
Oh my, he's here!
Hahahaha......You think that defeating a couple of lame heroes like these guys counts as defeating the Final Boss? What a joke!!!
Oh my, he's here!
null_s
Ah, Prince. How did you get here?
I heard that some upstart human was trying to train someone to become the ultimate Overlord.

...Hmm, and this is #NAME#?
You're quite bold for a human...
Forget it. I, the great Overlord Laharl, can tell whether you're right for the job. Let's see whether you're truly up to the task of training someone to be the ultimate Overlord!
You talk tough, but you were defeated so easily just now.
Prince Laharl is so weak.

Y-You idiots!
I was just testing this guy.

For the next battle, your opponents will be my very own elite troops!
Prepare yourself.

Oh wow.
It looks like Prince Laharl lost again.

T-This is impossible....!!
Why are my elite troops so pathetically weak...!!!??

Everyone knows that the Prince is an arrogant, selfish jerk!
You are not good enough to train other demons.

Prince, I'm curious...
How exactly did you train up those soldiers?
I've developed my own grueling training program....I make my soldiers play video games for 1000 hours straight, and forbid them from stopping to eat or drink, wash their hands or brush their teeth...
After they blow their nose, they have to show it to someone else. They're also forbidden from doing any homework during summer break. Basically, they have to get up to all sorts of bad behavior.
But.... how does any of that help someone become stronger?
Quiet! Only I get to decide if someone is qualified to train the strongest Overlord! Let's go!

Humph!
It seems... 
that maybe I underestimated you #NAME#.

Let me show you how powerful I am 
when I'm at Lv9999!

All I have to do is eat this, and
I'll be able to transform into a Lv9999 Demon God "in the blink of an eye"!!
....How's that for an advertising slogan? It really helps sell the product, don't you think? Anyway, here goes...
Trans........form!
null_s
null_s
null_s
....What?

W-W-What 
is this....
...!!??
Ahhhhhh...!!!!!
I've been changed into a woman?! But I'm the great and fearsome Laharl!
null_s

Is this some kind of joke!?
How can I show off my true power when I look like this!?
Well...I dare say there are many people who would say this new look is a real improvement for you.
I don't know what you've got to complain about, with such a perfect feminine body...
Looks like there's going to be some tough competition in the beauty stakes around here from now on!

What?! Prince Laharl, do you really 
think you're a match for us two?

You idiots!!
Stop fooling around! 
Find a way to get me back to normal!!

Geez...alright Betty Boop.
Let's get outta here, #NAME#.

Miss Etna.
Do you know how we can get Laharl back to normal?
I have no idea.
...Well, that isn't very helpful.

Hey, it's time for dessert!!
Sometimes, a good sugar boost is all one needs to come up with a solution to any problem!

Are you sure it's not just that you're 
having sugar cravings, Miss Etna?
What's with this pudding!? Boom! It doesn't have that delicious springiness that pudding is supposed to have! I want to speak with the boss of this restaurant!

It's you! 
The legendary Mr. Champloo...!!

That's me!
I am also a Kitchen Fist Master, trained in the Fire Chaos Style!
Champloo - at your service! Boom!

Hey, Miss Etna...
Do you know this guy?

He's a legendary Netherworld chef.
He's a true culinary genius, he can transform literally any ingredients into a wonderful meal.
What in the world is going on...
null_s

My name is Etna!
I wish to challenge you to a cooking battle, to see who can make the best dessert!!
A challenge, you say!? Boom - I accept! ... What ingredients can we use?
Oh. As luck would have it, there are some Prinnies over there...

Hmm? How strange.
I used a ton of Prinnies in this recipe, so how come the dessert still isn't ready?
But surely it's not possible to make a dessert this way!

Blasphemy! Anything can be cooked if you set your mind to it! Boom!
Cooking comes from the heart!
Cooking is a life and death business, kid! Don't underestimate it!

Behold my latest recipe!
I call it....
"Puffy Prinny Pudding"! Boom!

Wow! I'm going to have to taste this right away!!
.... Let's eat!

Ahh...that scent is incredible.
The texture is as smooth as silk. 
And its sweetness is unparalleled.....

This...This is amazing!
It's an unprecedented creation! It's spectacular! It's the greatest dessert ever made!
...It looks like Miss Etna's completely forgotten about the Laharl situation.
To be continued...

Ooooh...So full...
I can't even move.

Me too...
When I'm full, I usually fall asleep and start snoringâ€¦

Hey, #NAME#.
These two are hopeless.
I guess I'm just going to have to rely on you for now.
There is only one way that this cursed body will be restored to normal!
...The Dark Assembly!!
The place known as the Dark Assembly is one of the Netherworld's many awesome features. You can go there and get your wishes granted.
But be careful. The Dark Assembly is a place of cutthroat competition between powerful demons of different political persuasions.
It isn't as simple as a genie in a lamp granting you three wishes.

Alright, #NAME#. Let's head to the Dark Assembly and bribe the Senators.
It's best to bribe the highest ranking Senator possible.
Girl Laharl has temporarily become your partner!
Girl Laharl will now fight alongside you as a Companion.

Listen up, #NAME#!
As their name suggests, demons are the embodiment and source of all things evil.
A good demon should never wash their hands after using the toilet. They should steal their crush's clarinet and lick it, draw unflattering sketches of their teachers during class...

They also play video games for 100 hours every day and never ever share their snacks... 
Tell me, are you scared?
So, I hear you ask, what kind of bribe could possibly tempt a demon....?
The trick is to be sly about it.

...I hope no one sees me.
If I am discovered, it would be a huge scandal.
I, Lord Axel, aka the most popular dark hero, need to be respected by the Netherworld. If I get caught, my little hobby may get found out, and that would be a real scandal.
null_s
...Finally, the end is in sight!
I've finally got my hands on a fantastic machine that can get rid of those stupid pixelations! I'm now finally free to spread my wings and soar!

Oh sure! Men all over the world dream about being able to remove those pesky pixels! 
The Senators are no different.

Did you two hear what I just said?! 
Aargh, no! I've been dreaming of this for years! Now, all hope is lost!

Hatred courses through my veins! 
I'll get you for this!
At this point, Axel begins crying tears of fury...
Axel then declares that he will one day take his revenge on #NAME#.
Hmph. In the Netherworld, the strong eat the weak. If you want to hate someone, you should hate yourself for being so weak.
(â€» Note: This is a crime in the human world!)

Alright, #NAME#. Haha! Now, we're ready to bribe some Senators!
To the Dark Assembly!

I am Laharl, the Overlord!
Now Senators, listen to me. I've got something very important I'd like to discuss. Listen closely...
Give me back my real body!!
NAY! NAY! NAY! NAY!

Unbelievable!!
Well...I guess there is always another way to get people's approval.
#NAME#, come help me out!!
NAY! NAY! NAY! NAY!
Why!? Why are you all opposed!?

Overlord Laharl.
As the Speaker of the House, let me answer your question. All of us here are in agreement...
We all quite like your new appearance and we'd prefer that you stay this way.
Well...It's just that...we really like your new look.
S-Shut up! This is ridiculous!
Hahahahaha, don't pretend you can't see the signs!? You and I would make such a perfect match!

Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
ahhhhhh!!!!!!!!!

What?!
This body is preventing me from using my full power....!!

Muahahahahaha!
Give it up!
You have no way of escape!!
Sexy.......Beam!!
Sexy Beam's special effect..
Gwaaaaaaa!!?
The beautiful demon Etna has arrived!!

Get ready!
Love Punch!!

Love Punch's effect 
(Flonne's voice can also be heard shouting "Crab miso!")
Ahhhhhhhhhhh!!
The Angel of Love, Flonne, descends from the sky! Ta-daaa!!
Y-you guys are here...!

...Hmph. 
Late as always, I see.

Still as stubborn as ever. It's obvious you're happy to see us.
You never show a hint of honesty.
Yes well, that's just the Prince we know and love.

Well, then. 
Let's deal with these losers!
Prince Laharl and #NAME# will deal with the Speaker!

...Can't wait! #NAME#! 
Let's make bacon out of them!!
YEA! YEA! YEA! YEA!

A-Awesome!
We did it, #NAME#!!
The vote passed!
All it took was a little violence.
Well... This is the Netherworld, after all. So, who cares!

Oh? Oh?
My body....!!

Yes!!! I'm back!
No more melons!

Yes! This is the body of a real Overlord!!
Hahahahahaha!

......#NAME#.
I know an Overlord shouldn't say thanks, but...
To show my gratitude, I would just like to say, I believe you've got what it takes to train the greatest Overlord.
From this day forward, you will be my vassal.

#NAME# was made Laharl's vassal... without consent!
... And with no right to refuseâ€¦

In the future, we will fight side-by-side against even stronger enemies.
So, we've gotta start preparing.
null_s
Wow. Remember, the Prince doesn't hand out compliments very often, #NAME#.
So yeah, you should be proud of yourself for getting the Prince's approval so quickly.
#NAME# has such a pure and honest soul

....An admissions application?
From a human. How interesting.
Perhaps I can turn this human into a Delinquent.
To be continued...
Congrats, #NAME#! Welcome to the Evil Academy!
Flonne, this is all a bit unexpected.

Well, it isn't too late yet, and time is money.
If we're going to train someone to be the ultimate Overlord, we're going to have to help #NAME# speed things up a bit.

Ah...
So you're the transfer student I've been hearing about.

I am Raspberyl.
I am a Delinquent Teacher at this academy.
null_s

I've been hearing quite a bit about you, #NAME#.
I heard that you are a Delinquent.
However, as your homeroom teacher, I won't allow you to just be a common villain.
My goal is to make you the worst of the worst!!

Oh no!
What should we do about this, Miss Etna!?
I don't want #NAME# to become a Delinquent!

You don't think it would be wonderful?
I think it would be fascinating.
I will be very strict with you. I'll keep your nose to the grindstone right from day one. Which reminds me, our first lesson is on...
"Friendship"!!
Huh? Friendship?

Exactly! Learning about "friendship" 
is the first step towards becoming a true Delinquent!
Hmm... Why do I have the feeling that something bad is about to happen...?

Speak with your fists! That's how a real friendship is made!
Then you'll be able to do a triathlon as you run off into the sunset!
Come on! Class is in session, #NAME#!!

Excuse me, Ms. Raspberyl.
This class is all about "friendship", right?
Correct. If you want to be a Delinquent, you need to understand friendship.
...I have no idea what anyone's talking about.
Let me explain the values we believe in here at the Evil Academy!
What you call "good" in the Human World is villainous here, and students that you call "bad" are the Honor Students in the Netherworld.
At the Evil Academy, the rules of morality are flipped.
I see. This place truly is a Netherworld academy - utterly demonic through and through. Everything's all topsy-turvy.

Hmm.... So, is enrollment open?
I am confident that I could also become an Honor Student.
It seems that you already know a thing or two about being evil, #NAME#.
I'm sure that you will be able to make some solid friendships sooner or later.

Stop! 
Stop teaching this class this instant...!!!

I got word that some popsicle was teaching 
all kinds of airy-fairy nonsense at MY academy... I should have guessed it was you, Raspberyl...
null_s

Hello, Mao.
Do you have something you'd like to contribute?
Do I..?!! What is the first rule of the Evil Academy...!? "Demons must have no friends!"

Anyone who becomes a student here 
is forbidden from forming friendships!!
Oh, #NAME#. Since you clearly have no respect for this rule, you are not worthy of being a student here!
I hereby expel you from the Evil Academy!!

You got guts. 
I accept this duel! And #NAME# shall fight on my behalf!

If you get kicked out on the first day of school, you'll instantly become the very top Honor Student. 
Come on #NAME#, fight!

If you lose, then I'll conduct my experiments on you!
Muahahaha!
Muahahahah....

Ok, prepare yourself!
Let's see how you handle my Doppelganger!

Nice work, #NAME#.
It may be just a clone, but it's not easy to beat Mao.

#NAME#. Ok, class is over for today.
...Let's battle one more time!!

Ms. Raspberyl!
It may be too late to say this, but I would just like to say, violence is bad.
Yea... It's too late.

Huh? What's violent about what we're doing?
This course is all about what it means when hearts and fists come together!!
Okay, now I understand!!
Flonne, you're so gullible.

Well done, #NAME#.
Your skills are quite impressive. 
They're getting me all fired up.
From now on, me and you will be like frenemies.
Yoroshiku, let's take care of each other. #NAME#.

A friendship that comes from the heart and from the collision of fists..... 
That's the true meaning of youth!!
Flonne, will you also come to study at the Evil Academy? I think you'll have no problem becoming a Delinquent.
null_s

Hey, Raspberyl...
Don't you dare treat this human as your arch-rival (best friend)...

#NAME#.
I won't forget this.

Just you wait!
I'll conduct experiments on you yet!!
To be continued...

Is everyone here?
No tardies and no absences. Good, good.
You have all just started on your long journey to becoming a true Delinquent.

All rise!
Prepare yourselves!
Bow! Sit back down!

Heeheehee.
I've always wanted to do that.

Flonne, it seems you're settling into school life very well.
So, what are we learning about today?

Hmph...
Today's subject is "Volunteer Work"!

[Volunteer Work]
In ancient times, demons often used the phrase "expressing motherly love" to refer to volunteer work. Many demons feared doing it.
The etymology of this phrase can be traced back to the 13th Overlord of the Mourning Netherworld, Kuli.

At that time, the Mourning Netherworld was in financial difficulties, so it forced all its citizens to do unpaid labor. 
This was called the "Motherly Love Policy". That name has been used ever since.
The Overlord at that time wanted people to devote themselves to their country in the same way that mothers devote themselves to their children.

This policy was a complete failure. 
Eventually, it led to the Overlord being 
overthrown by his vassals.
That was an excerpt from the popular historical volume "How Volunteering Destroys Society"

Volunteer to help out your neighbors, just like a mother works tirelessly to look after her children!
What an awesome story.
It really helps people understand the importance of maternal love.

Hey, Flonne.
What's the matter with you?
Even if I did agree to do some volunteering, what exactly could we do?

We must protect the Evil Academy's morals! #NAME#!
The Nether Patrol has been dispatched!
The Nether Patrol.... What an awesome name! I can see it nowâ€¦ we'll be riding in spaceships and driving transforming robots...
Haha! Just imagining it makes my heart start to beat fast and my nose bleed!
Ok Flonne, I think you need to take some deep breaths.

The Nether Patrol has one simple mission.
Any time they come across an Honor Student, they hit them in the face with a punch of pure love. That's it.

.....Huh?
What about spaceships and transforming robots?

Ok! We're all set. Let's go volunteer 
and toil away our youth!!
I will not allow anyone to break the rules of this academy!!

What is the second rule of the Evil Academy...!?
"Never accept or give help to anyone else!"

But you want to do voluntary work!?
This is simply ridiculous!!
Prinnies, get out here!
Yes, master.
A couple of Prinnies. So what?
#NAME# has shattered our dream of improving our working conditions, dood....

But, there's more than one way to skin a Prinny!
His Majesty Mao has promised us that he will improve our working conditions!

*Sigh*
Out of interest, what exactly is Mao offering you?
To work all year round with no break! For 22 hours a day! For a daily salary of.....2 sardines!! 2 whole sardines, dood!! That's a twofold increase for us, dood!

*Without enthusiasm* Oh wow.
As much as that...

And we will continue to improve our working conditions!
We will struggle until we are finally respected!! Let's fight, dood!!

Amazing! You've defeated those Prinnies who I lured into battling you with extra sardines.
You are worthy of being my experiment subject.

However, this next foe will be much more of a challenge...
Get out here! Pringer V3!!
null_s

What!? He's combined a bunch of Prinnies to create a super alloy robot!?
This is not going to be easy...

You say that, but I can see that steely glint in your 
eye, Flonne.

Hahaha!
The V in Pringer V3 stands for victory, dood!
No one can survive a face off with the Pringer V3, dood!

We will not forget the 3 Prinnies 
who sacrificed themselves during the struggle, dood!!
Victory will be ours, dood!!

Aaaaaah!!!
Pringer V3 was defeated....
If we want to defeat #NAME#, it seems we must resort to our ultimate weapon, the legendary Prinny Bomb, dood...

Ugghhh!!!!
The Pringer V3 was an ingenious creation of my own outstanding design, how could it be defeated....?!
Well, think about it... At the end of the day, it was still just 3 Prinnies put together.

*Sobbing*....
You should have given Pringer V3 to me 
instead of letting it get destroyed.*Sobs louder*.

No need to get all teary-eyed just yet!
Look over there.

Pringer V3 
is getting up!

And it seems to be trying to express
 something. Is that look in its eyes...warmth? Friendliness?

#NAME#!
Let Pringer V3 join the party!!
Please, please, please, please, please, please! *this continues for about a minute*

#NAME#
has extended a hand of friendship to Pringer V3.
Pringer V3 has joined your team!

Yesterday's enemy is today's rival (friend).
You have cultivated a fiery friendship with an enemy...
Well done, #NAME#!

You're going to become an 
outstanding Delinquent. You really are full of surprises.

Ms. Raspberyl just said all that...
That means #NAME# is an 
incredibly good person, right?
Pretty much, yeah. But whether or not that's a good thing, I really can't say.

Miss Etna won't admit it, but she's expecting great things from 
#NAME#. 
Perhaps we really will be able to train the ultimate Overlord after all.
I'm not...

AHHHH....!!
I won't forgive you for this, #NAME#!
Enjoy your victory while it lasts.

Next time, I'll take you down once and for all.
I'll make you one of my test subjects yet!
To be continued...

Ms. Raspberyl!
What are you going to teach us today?

It looks like your genuinely excited to attend class. 
You have the makings of a true Delinquent, Miss Flonne!

Today, we will learn about....
"Doing Chores"!!

[Doing Chores]
Doing chores includes various household tasks like cleaning floors, washing clothes, and cooking. 
All the demons at the bottom of the social ladder used to do these things.

But then, Netherworld scientists
realized that doing chores 
can actually be therapeutic. They purify the soul, and can make you a better person.

This terrifying discovery sent shockwaves throughout the Netherworld. 
Lower class demons rebelled, refusing to do any more chores. 
The history books call this rebellion "The Bitter Squabble".

It is because of this rebellion 
that the Prinnies became our servants. Few demons today know this.

That was an excerpt from 
"A Secret History of Cleaning".

So, doing chores
can help demons purify their hearts.

So, students, do you think 
a Delinquent would hold an umbrella over a stray dog on a rainy day?
Once you've done some cleaning, you'll understand why the answer is obviously "yes".

Ms. Raspberyl!
...I don't think that's correct.
This "cleaning", is just going to eventually end in a fight, isn't it...

Yes, but that's because this academy 
is just crawling with Honor Students.

Those good-for-nothings prefer to just
throw their garbage into the street rather than take the time to take care of it properly.

Hmph....
Well we can "clean" up these Honor Students at the same time as we clean up the garbage on the streets!

No.
We must use the lash of love 
to turn those hateful Honor Students towards the light of righteousness!

You idiot!
Students at this academy are supposed to be evil!
That is why it is called the EVIL Academy!

What is the third rule of the Evil Academy...!?
"A demon should be curious and always 
look for new ways to be evil!"

A demon should live without a conscience! 
If a demon wants to do something, they shouldn't let morality stop them!

If you REALLY must do some cleaning, why don't you go to the [Item World]
and get me an "Elixir"!!

Eh?
Why do you want an Elixir?
Because I need it for an experiment!!
Everything's always all about YOU, isn't it!?

C-Come on! Go get me an Elixir!
If you don't get it, don't even think about ever getting a good grade in this academy!

You triggered a special task:
[Go to the Item World to get an Elixir]

If you don't complete this task, you can't progress further in this game!
So you need to complete it.

Not bad, #NAME#. 
You successfully obtained the Elixir!

You need to give it to 
His Majesty Mao as soon as possible.

Hey, did you forget our conversation?
Here's the Elixir you asked for.

Oh!
I didn't think you'd get it so quickly!
Damn you #NAME#, maybe you really do have potential....

Is that all?
If that's everything, then I will go back to my class now.

Alright....
But don't think for a second we're done with this topic.
Stop right there, #NAME#!

Mao...
What's your problem?
Why are you always causing trouble?

Hehehehe...No trouble. I'd just like to give you a little something 
as thanks for all the cleaning you've done.
null_s

Da-da-da-dun!
The Dark Hero, Axel!
Like a phoenix, I have been reborn!!

I saw this guy fall into a garbage dump. 
So I took him home and transformed his body.
With that Elixir.

Well, isn't that exactly what recycling is all about?
I never knew you were such a Villain at heart, Mao!

Y-You idiot! This is just an experiment... An EVIL experiment!
I've created a stimulant!
And look at the results!

Power.....
The incredible power!!
I feel like my heart is about to burst out of my chest!!
Uh...I think you may be having a myocardial infarction...

Listen carefully, can you hear it? 
That's the sound of the crowd from my most legendary performance ever.
Shouting for an encore!!
Erm...I think you are imagining things.

[Warning] 
Doping...

...is the use of drugs 
to improve athletic ability. 
Athletes try to conceal the fact that they do this.

This behavior is forbidden in sporting events like the Olympics in the Human World 
because it violates the spirit of athletics
and the principles of fair competition.

Additionally, drugs can often cause
serious side effects for humans. 
Good children must never do drugs.

Finally, I will have my revenge!
I don't want to be a human, #NAME#!!

What...? 
You were never a human in the first place.
Are you going crazy? It looks like that stimulant has scrambled your brain.

No, no, that is not what I mean. 
I just mean I'm ready to risk everything 
to get my revenge. You should learn to listen more carefully.

....One more time.
I don't want to be a human, #NAME#!!

Wow...! Just this once
I choose to let you live...

But #NAME#!
If you think that you can become more powerful than me, you're deluding yourself!
If you really want to be better than me, you'll have to learn how to rock out better than me....
null_s
Honestly! We managed to overcome all these obstacles, but our day of cleaning has been completely disrupted.

Sorry, everyone.
I guess my teaching style still needs some work...
No, don't talk like that, Ms. Raspberyl!

At the very least, we managed to clean up that piece of garbage Axel! 
That was exactly the same as
cleaning the slime off dinner plates!
Flonne, even when you say something super mean, you still say it with a smile on your face..

That's true! Mao himself said 
he found Axel in a garbage dump, right?
So you could say that we've successfully taken out the trash!

....Alright, let's continue our class!
Next, we should conduct one melee battle before the sun goes down!!
Yes, Ms. Raspberyl!

....So, #NAME#.
Do you think Axel is recyclable garbage?
Or is he destined straight for landfill?

Huh!?
... W-What is this place?

You're harder to kill than a cockroach.
Excellent.
You can definitely be made stronger.

Well, of course!
I am 
the strongest Dark Hero in the entire Netherworld!

Let me ask you a question, Axel.
You just said you don't want to be a human, right?

You seem very determined. I admire that...
Hahahahah...

Wait...
W-Why are you smiling like that!?

I will help you become stronger.
I'll attach a drill to your right hand and a rocket launcher to your left. 
On your right foot, I'll attach a Gatling gun and...

What!?
No! Don't come any closer!
N-N-Nooo!!!
To be continued...

So, this class is finally coming to its end.
Are you ready, #NAME#?

Of course! Don't pull your punches!
Ok? #NAME#.

A good answer!
Today, we will learn about....
"Fundraising"!!

[Fundraising] 
There is a famous proverb in the Netherworld about fundraising. 
It goes: "sell your parents to honor them."

A long time ago, there was a demon who was the perfect son to his parents.
He wanted to build his parents a magnificent tomb to honor them after their deaths, so he traveled everywhere to raise funds to build it.

He did everything he could think of to earn money.
He hung around near vending machines to pick up any loose change. 
He even became a scrap collector.
After doing this for 1000 years, this demon finally became very rich.

His hard work really paid off.
He was able to build a magnificent tomb to honor his parents.

But what happened to his parents?
Well...The demon had been so determined to raise funds 
that he even sold his parents in a bid to raise more cash.

That was an excerpt from 
"Proverbs and Allegories of the Netherworld"

Charities exist in the Netherworld.
